projects.title: Miniature Painting Studio Website
projects.body: Website for Miniature Painting Studio including gallery connected with Firebase Firestore, Administration panel connected with Firebase Firestore, Authentication and Storage, and Blog implementation based on headless CMS. Responsive design with mobile-first approach built with Vue.js framework and Pinia state management.
projects.technologies: Vue.js, Pinia,  Firebase, Sass, JavaScript, Headless CMS

projects.title: Anime App
projects.body: Responsive Vue.js SPA app using the Composition API, which integrates an Anime DB API. It allows users to search for anime titles, view details on specific anime, and create their own anime list. The app utilizes routing to provide a seamless user experience.
projects.technologies: Vue.js, JavaScript, API, Sass, Responsive Design
